metadata.synopsis: Goblin keeping watch at the player's camp..

0.speaker: Goblin Tracker
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Moaning the loss of his beer, then jumps to attention when he notices the player.NodeContext: Grumbling to himself at first, then notices the player.

2.speaker: Goblin Tracker
2.text: Coast all clear. Some stinkin' bird flew by some time ago, but I got it straight through the neck.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Jumps to attention and tries to subtly kick his beer cup out of sight.

1.speaker: Goblin Tracker
1.text: Any of those druids is still alive, they'll know not to mess with us.
